definitions: relating to the process of translating words or text from one language into another

examples.text: its appearance in English we owe to the translational skill of John Archer

shortDefinitions: relating to process of translating text from one language into another

definitions: relating to the conversion of something from one form or medium to another.
shortDefinitions: relating to conversion of something from one form into another

definitions: relating to the process of converting an RNA sequence to an amino acid sequence

examples.text: the effects of mitochondrial translational dysfunction

shortDefinitions: relating to process of converting RNA sequence into amino acid sequence

definitions: denoting or relating to basic research that is converted into practical, especially medical, applications

examples.text: a center of excellence that performs translational research on neurodegenerative diseases

shortDefinitions: denoting basic research that is converted into practical applications

definitions: denoting or relating to movement along a line (as distinct from other forms of motion such as rotation or oscillation)
